Package com.crudetech.matcher

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AffineTransformIsEqual
    This class provides a Matcher implementations for AffineTransform matrices.
    AllAre  
    FloatingPointMatcher
    Creates matcher implementations that compare floating point values using a specified tolerance value.
    OrderMatcher<T>  
    Point2DMatcher
    Creates Matcher implementations that compares Point2D using a tolerance: assertThat(new Point2D.Double(2, 4), is(equalTo(new Point2D.Double(2, 4), withTol(1.e-2)));
    RangeContains
    Provides Matcher implementations concerning the containment of items in a range.
    RangeHasSize  
    RangeIsEmpty  
    RangeIsEqual
    This class provides several Matcher implementations to compare ranges for equality.
    RangeIsEquivalent
    This class provides several Matcher implementations to compare ranges for equivalence, i.e. they have the same content but not necessarily in the same order.
    Rectangle2DIsEqual
    Provides Matcher implementations to compare Rectangle2D implementations.
    SameTypeAs
    Creates a Matcher that can be used to check if two given objects are from the exact same type.
    ShapesAreEqual  
    StringNullOrEmptyMatcher  
    ThrowsException
    A Matcher implementation that checks if exceptions were thrown.
    Verify
    This class can be used for input validation using hamcrest matchers.
